Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2015 11:54AM Kkrew wrote: Deem, hang in there. I finished chemo April 20 2012 and shed my wig on July 4. It feels like it's taking forever but I promise it will come back! 3 yrs later and I have thick (curly) brown hair to the middle of my back. I really thought it would only take a few weeks to come in but in truth I didn't feel comfortable going wigless for a couple of months. Best of luck to you and congratulations on finishing chemo. You are a warrior.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
